Name: ProcessingInstructionSchemeName
Description: A name for the ProcessingInstructionScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the ProcessingInstructionScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the ProcessingInstructionScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: ProcessingInstructionSchemeReference
Description: Reference to an existing ProcessingInstructionScheme for inclusion.

Name: GeneralInstructionReference
Description: A General Instruction described in the Processing Instruction Scheme.

Name: GenerationInstructionReference
Description: A Generation Instruction described in the Processing Instruction Scheme.

Name: ProcessingInstructionGroupReference
Description: A description of a group of ProcessingInstructions for administrative or conceptual purposes.
